name: Clutchrun
description:
A first person, fast-paced, blockplacing, speedrunning game

Use the blocks to clutch and boost yourself to jump or dash high and far, to get to the finish as fast as possible.

Features:

- 11 Unique levels
- Leaderboards
- Level Editor
- Ability to upload and download custom levels in game

Controls:

- WSAD or Arrows - Movement
- Space - Jump
- Shift/CTRL - Slide
- Mouse - Looking around
- Mouse0 - Place block
- Mouse Wheel - Block switching

- Normal block - C
- Goo block - V
